game.name: Strikers 1945 2
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 일반부터 매니아까지 폭넓은 고객층이 안심하고 플레이할 수 있는 사이쿄 계열 시스템에, 연사 레벨 3단계 강화의 신시스템을 탑재하여 전략성이 더욱 높아졌습니다. 아직 플레이하지 않은 분들도 꼭 플레이해 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Saikyo-style system, trusted by players from casual gamers to hardcore enthusiasts, now features a new three-stage charge shot enhancement system, significantly boosting strategic depth. If you haven't played it yet, we urge you to give it a try.
